description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
family species groups of individual participants - 1= orangutan/ 2= gorilla/3=bonobo/chimpanzee
amount of training trials
presentation of the conditions
conditions of the study- place= reward does not move with the cover  /feature= reward moves with the cover
location of the food at the beginning  of the trial
location of the food at the end of the trial
response based on place strategy
response  based on feature strategy
participant choice
whether the participant obtains the reward or not
whether the cover was switched - no switch/ switch

whether the participants choice strategy  was   - error= choice was not based in place or feature strategy /place=  participant choice was based on place strategy/feature = choice was based on feature strategy  /both=choice was based on place and feature estrategy
finger in the whole strategy-   keep / exclude
excluded – keep/exclude
